SELECT user_id, notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT user_id, notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE language LIKE 'E%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(theme) AS theme_count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM user_preferences GROUP BY theme;
SELECT theme, COUNT(theme) AS theme_count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY theme HAVING COUNT(theme) > 1;
SELECT user_id, language, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id, language;

SELECT user_id, MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT app_id, dark_mode_enabled FROM app_settings WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences JOIN app_settings ON user_id = app_id;
SELECT user_id, theme, notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences LEFT JOIN app_settings ON user_id = app_id WHERE notifications_enabled IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, theme, dark_mode_enabled FROM user_preferences RIGHT JOIN app_settings ON user_id = app_id WHERE theme = 'light';

SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences INTERSECT SELECT app_id, 'default' FROM app_settings;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences EXCEPT SELECT app_id, 'default' FROM app_settings;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(theme) AS theme_count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_id, MIN(theme) AS min_theme FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_id, SUM(user_id) AS sum_user_id FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences ORDER BY theme ASC;

SELECT user_id, app_name FROM Blockchain_Apps WHERE app_description LIKE '%finance%'
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences AS UP INNER JOIN Settings ON UP.user_id = Settings.user_id
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences AS UP LEFT JOIN Settings ON UP.user_id = Settings.user_id
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences AS UP RIGHT JOIN Settings ON UP.user_id = Settings.user_id
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences AS UP FULL JOIN Settings ON UP.user_id = Settings.user_id

SELECT user_id, notification_enabled FROM Settings WHERE notification_enabled = true

SELECT * FROM User_Preferences WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM Settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = true)
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences UP JOIN Settings S ON UP.user_id = S.user_id WHERE S.notification_enabled = true
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_enabled FROM User_Preferences UP JOIN Settings S ON UP.user_id = S.user_id WHERE UP.theme = 'Light'
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = true)
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM Blockchain_Apps WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM User_Preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark')
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM User_Preferences UP LEFT JOIN Settings S ON UP.user_id = S.user_id WHERE S.user_id IS NULL
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_enabled FROM User_Preferences UP LEFT JOIN Settings S ON UP.user_id = S.user_id WHERE S.user_id IS NULL OR S.dark_mode_enabled = false
SELECT user_id, app_name, app_description FROM Blockchain_Apps BA JOIN User_Preferences UP ON BA.user_id = UP.user_id WHERE UP.theme = 'Dark' AND UP.language = 'English'
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark' UNION SELECT * FROM User_Preferences WHERE theme = 'Light'

SELECT user_id, theme, language, dark_mode_enabled FROM User_Preferences UP JOIN Settings S ON UP.user_id = S.user_id WHERE S.notification_enabled = true

SELECT * FROM User_Preferences WHERE language LIKE 'Eng%'
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled FROM Settings WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM User_Preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark' AND language = 'English')
SELECT app_id, app_name, app_description FROM Blockchain_Apps WHERE app_id = (SELECT app_id FROM Blockchain_Apps WHERE app_name = 'Example App')
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_enabled FROM User_Preferences UP JOIN Settings S ON UP.user_id = S.user_id WHERE UP.theme = 'Dark' AND S.notification_enabled = true
SELECT * FROM User_Preferences WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM Settings WHERE notification_enabled = true)

SELECT user_id, two_factor_auth_enabled FROM SecurityPreferences WHERE two_factor_auth_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE notifications_enabled = true;

SELECT UserPreferences.user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled, blockchain_network, node_address FROM UserPreferences JOIN BlockchainSettings ON UserPreferences.user_id = BlockchainSettings.user_id;

SELECT UserPreferences.user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled, blockchain_network, node_address, wallet_address FROM UserPreferences JOIN BlockchainSettings ON UserPreferences.user_id = BlockchainSettings.user_id WHERE UserPreferences.user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'Dark' OR language = 'English';
SELECT UserPreferences.user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled, two_factor_auth_enabled FROM UserPreferences JOIN SecurityPreferences ON UserPreferences.user_id = SecurityPreferences.user_id;

SELECT UserPreferences.user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled, two_factor_auth_enabled, encryption_key FROM UserPreferences JOIN SecurityPreferences ON UserPreferences.user_id = SecurityPreferences.user_id WHERE UserPreferences.notifications_enabled = true;

SELECT UserPreferences.user_id, theme, language, notifications_enabled, two_factor_auth_enabled, encryption_key, blockchain_network FROM UserPreferences JOIN SecurityPreferences ON UserPreferences.user_id = SecurityPreferences.user_id JOIN BlockchainSettings ON UserPreferences.user_id = BlockchainSettings.user_id;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT TransactionHistory.user_id, TransactionHistory.timestamp, TransactionHistory.amount, UserPreferences.theme FROM TransactionHistory JOIN UserPreferences ON TransactionHistory.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id;

SELECT TransactionHistory.user_id, TransactionHistory.timestamp, TransactionHistory.amount, UserPreferences.theme, SecurityPreferences.two_factor_auth_enabled FROM TransactionHistory JOIN UserPreferences ON TransactionHistory.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id JOIN SecurityPreferences ON TransactionHistory.user_id = SecurityPreferences.user_id;

SELECT TransactionHistory.user_id, TransactionHistory.timestamp, TransactionHistory.amount, UserPreferences.theme, SecurityPreferences.two_factor_auth_enabled, blockchain_network FROM TransactionHistory JOIN UserPreferences ON TransactionHistory.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id JOIN SecurityPreferences ON TransactionHistory.user_id = SecurityPreferences.user_id JOIN BlockchainSettings ON TransactionHistory.user_id = BlockchainSettings.user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 500;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MIN(timestamp) AS first_transaction FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_transaction FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT timestamp) AS unique_timestamps FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_settings;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled FROM user_settings;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_settings WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_preferences;
SELECT user_id, network FROM blockchain_preferences;
SELECT user_id, node_address FROM blockchain_preferences WHERE wallet_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM notification_settings;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications_enabled FROM notification_settings;
SELECT user_id, sms_notifications_enabled FROM notification_settings WHERE push_notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM security_settings;
SELECT user_id, two_factor_auth_enabled FROM security_settings;
SELECT user_id, password FROM security_settings WHERE security_question = 'What is your pet's name?';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences JOIN user_settings ON user_preferences.user_id = user_settings.user_id;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled, currency FROM user_settings JOIN blockchain_preferences ON user_settings.user_id = blockchain_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications_enabled, two_factor_auth_enabled FROM notification_settings JOIN security_settings ON notification_settings.user_id = security_settings.user_id;
SELECT user_id, theme, network, node_address FROM user_preferences JOIN blockchain_preferences ON user_preferences.user_id = blockchain_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, currency, wallet_address, password FROM user_settings JOIN security_settings ON user_settings.user_id = security_settings.user_id;
SELECT user_id, notification_enabled, push_notifications_enabled, security_question FROM user_preferences JOIN notification_settings ON user_preferences.user_id = notification_settings.user_id;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled, currency, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = true AND timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT b.user_id, b.network, b.node_address, n.email_notifications_enabled FROM blockchain_preferences b JOIN notification_settings n ON b.user_id = n.user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.two_factor_auth_enabled, s.security_question FROM security_settings s JOIN user_preferences u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.theme = 'Dark';

SELECT u.user_id, u.theme, s.node_address, n.email_notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences u JOIN blockchain_preferences s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN notification_settings n ON u.user_id = n.user_id;
SELECT user_id, currency, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE currency IN ('USD', 'EUR') AND timezone LIKE '%Asia%';
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, password, security_question FROM security_settings WHERE two_factor_auth_enabled = true;
SELECT b.user_id, b.network, b.wallet_address, n.sms_notifications_enabled FROM blockchain_preferences b JOIN notification_settings n ON b.user_id = n.user_id WHERE b.network = 'Ethereum';

SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id, s.currency, s.timezone, n.push_notifications_enabled FROM user_settings s JOIN user_preferences u ON s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN notification_settings n ON u.user_id = n.user_id;

SELECT u.user_id, u.two_factor_auth_enabled, s.node_address, n.push_notifications_enabled FROM security_settings s JOIN user_preferences u ON s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN notification_settings n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE s.two_factor_auth_enabled = true;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = false;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled, currency, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = false AND currency = 'Bitcoin' AND timezone = 'PST';
SELECT b.user_id, b.node_address, n.email_notifications_enabled, n.sms_notifications_enabled FROM blockchain_preferences b JOIN notification_settings n ON b.user_id = n.user_id;

SELECT u.user_id, u.theme, s.security_question, n.sms_notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences u JOIN security_settings s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN notification_settings n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE n.sms_notifications_enabled = true;

SELECT u.user_id, u.theme, s.wallet_address, n.push_notifications_enabled FROM user_preferences u JOIN blockchain_preferences s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN notification_settings n ON u.user_id = n.user_id WHERE n.push_notifications_enabled = true;

SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id, s.dark_mode_enabled, n.push_notifications_enabled FROM user_settings s JOIN security_settings ss ON s.user_id = ss.user_id JOIN user_preferences u ON s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN notification_settings n ON s.user_id = n.user_id;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002');
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled, currency, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE currency = 'USD' AND timezone = 'EST';

SELECT b.user_id, b.network, b.wallet_address, n.push_notifications_enabled FROM blockchain_preferences b JOIN notification_settings n ON b.user_id = n.user_id WHERE n.push_notifications_enabled = true;
